main event: A UFO was sighted over the city of Corbin, Kentucky on 9 February 1953. The object was described as bright, oval-shaped, and appeared to be stationary before rapidly accelerating and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a reliable and credible witness with no known history of reporting unusual aerial phenomena.
The UFO was observed reflecting sunlight and remained in the same position for approximately 2-3 minutes before accelerating and vanishing to the northwest.
The witness stated that they were unable to discern any sound or exhaust trail from the object.
The report requested a thorough investigation as part of Project Blue Book, which was an official U.S. Air Force investigation of unidentified flying objects.
The conclusion of the investigation was that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
